347 words written on Sat, Dec 29 2007

For a moment this person is almost creeped out by the scene, but it would be so like this person to become depressed on the happiest day ever, and so this person bucks up and joins the crowd.

Math teachers are saying that math was just a funny way of saying ‚ÄúI love you.‚Äù But now they are simply saying it, I love you, and the chemistry and PE teachers are also saying it and this person can tell they really mean it. It‚Äôs totally amazing. Certain jerks and idiots and assholes appear from time to time, and it is as if they have had plastic surgery, their faces are disfigured with love. Best of all, every person this person has ever loved is there. Even the ones who got away. They hold this person‚Äôs hand and tell this person how hard it was to pretend to get mad and drive off and never come back. But everyone soothes this person. Everyone explains that it was absolutely necessary to know how strong this person was.
